code: import{configureStore,applyMiddleware}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import rizeZoneApp,{riceZoneApp}from"./reducers";import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import{persistReducer,persistStore}from'redux-persist';import thunk from'redux-thunk';var persistConfig={key:'root',storage:storage};var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,riceZoneApp);var composedEnhancer=composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));export var store=configureStore({reducer:persistedReducer,middleware:[thunk]},composedEnhancer);export var persistor=persistStore(store);
